page.title: 04Amenities in Sedgley (2)
page.content:
{Post Office:
I use the{Post Office}so that I can buy stamps for my letters and also I can post my letters from the Post Office.Also there you can have your parcels weighed so that the correct number of stamps to be used is known.
{Chemist: { I use the{chemist}so that I can fetch the medicine the{Doctor}has prescribed for me.Also I can buy cough sweets from there and pens and pencils.
{Market:} From the{market}I mainly fetch the dog food.My mom also buys clothes and Birthday cards from there because it is the cheapest place for most things in{Sedgley.}
